summary:
Final Fantasy is a popular video game series started in 1987 by Hironobu Sakaguchi. It's a fantasy adventure with many spin-offs and different types of games. There are 16 main games, each with a unique story and characters, but they share some special elements. The games are about brave heroes fighting evil, and they have cool features like amazing visuals and great music. 

Over time, Final Fantasy has become super successful and is loved by many gamers worldwide. It has even inspired other games with its creative ideas.
title: Final Fantasy
